source.query: SELECT * FROM SFT200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND SFT200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND FT_ENTRADA BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'

SELECT * FROM SD2200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND D2_EMISSAO BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206' UNION ALL SELECT SD2.* FROM SF1200 SF1 (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SD1200 SD1 (NOLOCK) ON SD1.D1_FILIAL = SF1.F1_FILIAL AND SD1.D1_DOC = SF1.F1_DOC AND SD1.D1_SERIE = SF1.F1_SERIE AND SD1.D1_FORNECE = SF1.F1_FORNECE AND SD1.D1_LOJA = SF1.F1_LOJA AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SD2200 SD2 (NOLOCK) ON SD2.D2_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SD2.D2_DOC = SD1.D1_NFORI AND SD2.D2_SERIE = SD1.D1_SERIORI AND SD2.D2_ITEM  = SD1.D1_ITEMORI INNER JOIN SF2200 SF2 (NOLOCK) ON SF2.F2_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SF2.F2_DOC = SD2.D2_DOC AND SF2.F2_SERIE = SD2.D2_SERIE AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' WHERE 1=1 AND SF1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND F1_DTDIGIT BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'
SELECT * FROM SD1200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND D1_DTDIGIT BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'

SELECT * FROM SF2200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND F2_EMISSAO BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206' UNION ALL SELECT SF2.* FROM SF1200 SF1 (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SD1200 SD1 (NOLOCK) ON SD1.D1_FILIAL = SF1.F1_FILIAL AND SD1.D1_DOC = SF1.F1_DOC AND SD1.D1_SERIE = SF1.F1_SERIE AND SD1.D1_FORNECE = SF1.F1_FORNECE AND SD1.D1_LOJA = SF1.F1_LOJA AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SD2200 SD2 (NOLOCK) ON SD2.D2_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SD2.D2_DOC = SD1.D1_NFORI AND SD2.D2_SERIE = SD1.D1_SERIORI AND SD2.D2_ITEM  = SD1.D1_ITEMORI INNER JOIN SF2200 SF2 (NOLOCK) ON SF2.F2_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SF2.F2_DOC = SD2.D2_DOC AND SF2.F2_SERIE = SD2.D2_SERIE AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' WHERE 1=1 AND SF1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND F1_DTDIGIT BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'

SELECT A1_FILIAL,A1_COD,A1_LOJA,A1_VEND,A1_PESSOA,A1_NOME,A1_NREDUZ,A1_TIPO,A1_END,A1_MUN,A1_EST,A1_NATUREZ,A1_BAIRRO,A1_ESTADO,A1_CEP,A1_ATIVIDA,A1_CXPOSTA,A1_TEL,A1_TELEX,A1_FAX,A1_CONTATO,A1_CONTAT1,A1_ENDCOB,A1_BAICOB,A1_CEPCOB,A1_MUNCOB,A1_ESTCOB,A1_PAIS,A1_ENDREC,A1_ENDENT,A1_BAIENT,A1_MUNENT,A1_ESTENT,A1_CEPENT,A1_CONENT,A1_CGC,A1_INSCR,A1_INSCRM,A1_COMIS,A1_REGIAO,A1_CONTA,A1_BCO1,A1_BCO2,A1_BCO3,A1_BCO4,A1_BCO5,A1_TRANSP,A1_TPFRET,A1_COND,A1_DESC,A1_PRIOR,A1_RISCO,A1_LC,A1_VENCLC,A1_CLASSE,A1_MCOMPRA,A1_METR,A1_MSALDO,A1_NROCOM,A1_PRICOM,A1_ULTCOM,A1_TEMVIS,A1_ULTVIS,A1_FORMVIS,A1_TMPSTD,A1_TMPVIS,A1_CLASVEN,A1_MENSAGE,A1_NROPAG,A1_SALDUP,A1_SALPEDL,A1_TRANSF,A1_SUFRAMA,A1_ATR,A1_VACUM,A1_SALPED,A1_TITPROT,A1_DTULTIT,A1_CHQDEVO,A1_DTULCHQ,A1_MATR,A1_MAIDUPL,A1_TABELA,A1_INCISS,A1_SALDUPM,A1_PAGATR,A1_CARGO1,A1_CONTAT2,A1_CARGO2,A1_CONTAT3,A1_CARGO3,A1_SUPER,A1_RTEC,A1_ALIQIR,A1_OBSERV,A1_RG,A1_CALCSUF,A1_DTNASC,A1_SALPEDB,A1_CLIFAT,A1_GRPTRIB,A1_BAIRROC,A1_CEPC,A1_MUNC,A1_ESTC,A1_BAIRROE,A1_CEPE,A1_MUNE,A1_ESTE,A1_SATIV1,A1_SATIV2,A1_SATIV3,A1_SATIV4,A1_SATIV5,A1_SATIV6,A1_SATIV7,A1_SATIV8,A1_CODMARC,A1_CODAGE,A1_COMAGE,A1_TIPCLI,A1_EMAIL,A1_DEST_1,A1_CODMUN,A1_DEST_2,A1_HPAGE,A1_DEST_3,A1_CONDPAG,A1_DIASPAG,A1_OBS,A1_AGREG,A1_CODHIST,A1_RECINSS,A1_RECCOFI,A1_RECCSLL,A1_RECPIS,A1_CODOLD,A1_USERLGA,A1_USERLGI,A1_CLIOBS,A1_DTCOLET,A1_DTSAIDA,A1_NCOLETA,A1_CONTCOL,A1_NFNUM,A1_USOREVI,' ' AS A1_OBSCLI,A1_COMALT,A1_REDCOM,A1_DDI,A1_DDD,A1_PFISICA,A1_LCFIN,A1_MOEDALC,A1_RECISS,A1_TIPPER,A1_COD_MUN,A1_SALFIN,A1_SALFINM,A1_B2B,A1_BALANCA,A1_MODBA,A1_CARTORI,A1_ORIGIMP,A1_DATCAD,A1_NCARTOR,A1_PROMOTO,A1_CANAL,A1_GRPVEN,A1_CODMOB,A1_CLICNV,A1_SITUA,A1_SUBCOD,A1_ABATIMP,A1_TELEV,A1_MSBLQL,A1_INSCRUR,A1_NUMRA,A1_CDRDES,A1_FILDEB,A1_CODFOR,A1_ABICS,A1_EMAILFI,A1_EMAILDI,A1_OBCXMAS,A1_QTDLOJA,A1_TPESSOA,A1_PABCB,A1_TPISSRS,A1_CTARE,A1_RECFET,A1_GARCOM,A1_CAN002,A1_VEND002,A1_CAN015,A1_VEND015,A1_CODLOC,A1_SIMPNAC,A1_CONTRIB,A1_VINCULO,A1_DTINIV,A1_DTFIMV,A1_NUMEND,A1_COMEND,' ' AS A1_CLIOBS2,A1_OBSCLI2,A1_WKFCOB,A1_CODPAIS,A1_CONTAB,A1_BLEMAIL,A1_TIPOCLI,A1_IBGE,A1_SIMPLES,A1_CEINSS,A1_RECIRRF,A1_TIMEKEE,A1_PRSTSER,A1_ALIFIXA,A1_COMPLEM,A1_FOMEZER,A1_CNAE,A1_CLASCML,A1_PCTVPC,A1_FLCREDF,A1_RMA,A1_USERRMA,A1_SENHARM,A1_MAILRMA,A1_XDTENTG,A1_XDTSAIG,A1_XCMPAUT,A1_MLFWSL,A1_TRANSP2,A1_XDTALTF,A1_CODSIAF,A1_ENDNOT,A1_XVPCEXT,A1_CBO,A1_LOCCONS,A1_PERFIL,A1_HRTRANS,A1_UNIDVEN,A1_FRETISS,A1_XEXPZAW,A1_MLTPFAT,A1_XAGENDA,A1_CRDMA,A1_REGPB,A1_RFACS,A1_RFABOV,A1_ENTID,A1_INCULT,A1_USADDA,A1_MINIRF,A1_XVPCACM,A1_TPCLIML,A1_XGRPECO,A1_XENVDEP,A1_XSND2A,A1_XDEPCLA,A1_XDEPRIS,A1_XDEPUSR,A1_XDEPDAT,A1_XAGENC,A1_XCONTA,A1_XFLDEPS,A1_XCLIECM,A1_XBONUS,A1_XCEL,A1_XIDSITE,A1_XATUDEP,D_E_L_E_T_,R_E_C_N_O_,R_E_C_D_E_L_,A1_XPZOADC,A1_XTABVTO,A1_XSENHA,A1_BXVPC,A1_XTRAY,A1_XCATVIP,A1_XDATALT,A1_REGESIM,A1_PERCATM,A1_IPWEB,A1_PERFECP,A1_IRBAX,A1_INDRET,A1_OUTRMUN,A1_XTELCOB,A1_TPJ,A1_TRIBFAV,A1_XSCC,A1_CBAIRRE,A1_CODMUNE,A1_TIPPRFL,A1_PRF_VLD,A1_PRF_COD,' ' AS A1_PRF_OBS,A1_TDA,A1_FILTRF,A1_CODFID,A1_ORIGEM,A1_TPDP,A1_XSEGMTO,A1_XRMATOT,A1_XFATTOT,A1_XATBSEG,A1_XEND,A1_XNUMERO,A1_XBAIRRO,A1_XMUNICI,A1_XCOMPLE,A1_INOVAUT,A1_XULTATU,A1_IDHIST,A1_NIF,A1_MATFUN,A1_TPNFSE,A1_IENCONT,A1_RECFMD,A1_XTPELIM,A1_XCRDAUT,A1_XDTLC,A1_XMAATRA,A1_XPRAZMV,A1_XTPGAR,A1_XDTVGAR,A1_XVALGAR,A1_INCLTMG,A1_XGRTRIB,A1_XADMPRE,A1_XVPXMIN,A1_XEMAIL,A1_XVPXPAD,A1_XCTACRE,A1_RFUNDES,A1_RIMAMT,A1_RFASEMT,A1_VEND003,A1_VEND004,A1_VEND005,A1_DSCREG,A1_HRCAD,A1_DTCAD,A1_CLIPRI,A1_LOJPRI,A1_CODSEG,A1_TPREG,A1_MSEXP,A1_RESERVE,A1_ENTORI,A1_CODMEMB,A1_CHVCAM,A1_CODTER,A1_TPMEMB,A1_RESFAT,A1_NVESTN,A1_IMGUMOV,A1_IDESTN,A1_TPCAMP,A1_ORIGCT,A1_HREXPO,A1_ISSRSLC,A1_COMPENT,A1_XEXAUTO,A1_XEXCHEI,A1_XBLINDA,A1_XCTADEV,A1_MSDL FROM SA1200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND D_E_L_E_T_ = ''

SELECT C6_FILIAL,C6_ITEM,C6_PRODUTO,C6_DESCRI,C6_UM,C6_LOCAL,C6_QTDVEN,C6_PRCVEN,C6_VALOR,C6_QTDLIB,C6_TES,C6_CF,C6_VAZIO,C6_NUMCART,C6_SEGUM,C6_UNSVEN,C6_QTDEMP,C6_QTDENT,C6_CLI,C6_DESCONT,C6_VALDESC,C6_ENTREG,C6_LA,C6_LOJA,C6_NOTA,C6_SERIE,C6_DATFAT,C6_NUM,C6_COMIS1,C6_COMIS2,C6_COMIS3,C6_COMIS4,C6_COMIS5,C6_PEDCLI,C6_PRUNIT,C6_BLOQUEI,C6_GEROUPV,C6_RESERVA,C6_OP,C6_OK,C6_NFORI,C6_SERIORI,C6_ITEMORI,C6_IPIDEV,C6_IDENTB6,C6_BLQ,C6_PICMRET,C6_CODISS,C6_GRADE,C6_ITEMGRD,C6_LOTECTL,C6_NUMLOTE,C6_DTVALID,C6_NUMORC,C6_CHASSI,C6_OPC,C6_LOCALIZ,C6_NUMSERI,C6_NUMOP,C6_ITEMOP,C6_CLASFIS,C6_QTDRESE,C6_NUMOS,C6_NUMOSFA,C6_CODFAB,C6_LOJAFA,C6_TPOP,C6_REVISAO,C6_USERLGI,C6_USERLGA,C6_QTDLIB2,C6_QTDENT2,C6_SERVIC,C6_ENDPAD,C6_CONTRT,C6_TPCONTR,C6_ITCONTR,C6_PROJPMS,C6_TASKPMS,C6_LICITA,C6_QTDEMP2,C6_VPCBON,C6_PROMO,C6_CONTRAT,C6_ITEMCON,C6_EDTPMS,C6_TRT,C6_PROJET,C6_ITPROJ,C6_POTENCI,C6_REGWMS,C6_ABSCINS,C6_ABATISS,C6_ABATMAT, ' ' AS C6_MOPC,C6_NUMCP,C6_NUMSC,C6_ITEMSC,C6_SUGENTR,C6_ICMSRET,C6_PRODORI,C6_ITEMED,C6_FUNRURA,C6_FETAB,C6_CODROM,C6_MLDESCO,C6_XDELHIS,C6_TPDEDUZ,C6_MOTDED,C6_FORDED,C6_LOJDED,C6_SERDED,C6_NFDED,C6_VLNFD,C6_PCDED,C6_VLDED,C6_ABATINS,C6_CODLAN,C6_XCCUSTO,C6_VPCEXTR,C6_XREFAUT,SC6200.D_E_L_E_T_,SC6200.R_E_C_N_O_,SC6200.R_E_C_D_E_L_,C6_BASVEIC,C6_TNATREC,C6_CNATREC,C6_GRPNATR,C6_DTFIMNT,C6_XESTMIN,C6_PROGRAM,C6_TURNO,C6_ITPC,C6_PVCOMOP,C6_VDMOST,C6_FILPED,C6_PEDCOM,' ' AS C6_VDOBS,C6_RATEIO,C6_ITLPRE,C6_D1SERIE,C6_D1DOC,C6_CODLPRE,C6_D1ITEM,C6_VLIMPOR,C6_FCICOD,C6_XFILA,C6_CODINF,C6_HORENT,C6_ITEMPC,C6_PMSID,C6_PEDVINC,C6_REVPROD,C6_PRODFIN,C6_NUMPCOM,C6_TPESTR,C6_CC,C6_CONTA,C6_ITEMCTA,C6_CLVL,C6_DATCPL,C6_HORCPL,C6_INTROT,C6_CATEG,C6_CTVAR,C6_PENE,C6_GCPLT,C6_GCPIT,C6_ALMTERC,C6_ITEMGAR,C6_ORCGAR,C6_CCUSTO,C6_SOLCOM,C6_CULTRA,C6_TPPROD,C6_SDOCORI,C6_SDOC,C6_SDOCDED,C6_SDOCSD1,C6_CSTPIS,C6_NRSEQCQ,C6_IPITRF,C6_DATAEMB,C6_TPREPAS,C6_OPER,C6_MSEXP,C6_XNUMID,C6_XKIT,C6_MSDL FROM SD2200 (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SC6200 (NOLOCK) ON SD2200.D2_FILIAL = SC6200.C6_FILIAL AND SD2200.D2_COD = SC6200.C6_PRODUTO AND SD2200.D2_ITEM = SC6200.C6_ITEM AND SD2200.D2_PEDIDO = SC6200.C6_NUM WHERE 1=1 AND SD2200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SC6200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND D2_EMISSAO BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'  UNION ALL SELECT C6_FILIAL,C6_ITEM,C6_PRODUTO,C6_DESCRI,C6_UM,C6_LOCAL,C6_QTDVEN,C6_PRCVEN,C6_VALOR,C6_QTDLIB,C6_TES,C6_CF,C6_VAZIO,C6_NUMCART,C6_SEGUM,C6_UNSVEN,C6_QTDEMP,C6_QTDENT,C6_CLI,C6_DESCONT,C6_VALDESC,C6_ENTREG,C6_LA,C6_LOJA,C6_NOTA,C6_SERIE,C6_DATFAT,C6_NUM,C6_COMIS1,C6_COMIS2,C6_COMIS3,C6_COMIS4,C6_COMIS5,C6_PEDCLI,C6_PRUNIT,C6_BLOQUEI,C6_GEROUPV,C6_RESERVA,C6_OP,C6_OK,C6_NFORI,C6_SERIORI,C6_ITEMORI,C6_IPIDEV,C6_IDENTB6,C6_BLQ,C6_PICMRET,C6_CODISS,C6_GRADE,C6_ITEMGRD,C6_LOTECTL,C6_NUMLOTE,C6_DTVALID,C6_NUMORC,C6_CHASSI,C6_OPC,C6_LOCALIZ,C6_NUMSERI,C6_NUMOP,C6_ITEMOP,C6_CLASFIS,C6_QTDRESE,C6_NUMOS,C6_NUMOSFA,C6_CODFAB,C6_LOJAFA,C6_TPOP,C6_REVISAO,C6_USERLGI,C6_USERLGA,C6_QTDLIB2,C6_QTDENT2,C6_SERVIC,C6_ENDPAD,C6_CONTRT,C6_TPCONTR,C6_ITCONTR,C6_PROJPMS,C6_TASKPMS,C6_LICITA,C6_QTDEMP2,C6_VPCBON,C6_PROMO,C6_CONTRAT,C6_ITEMCON,C6_EDTPMS,C6_TRT,C6_PROJET,C6_ITPROJ,C6_POTENCI,C6_REGWMS,C6_ABSCINS,C6_ABATISS,C6_ABATMAT,' ' AS C6_MOPC,C6_NUMCP,C6_NUMSC,C6_ITEMSC,C6_SUGENTR,C6_ICMSRET,C6_PRODORI,C6_ITEMED,C6_FUNRURA,C6_FETAB,C6_CODROM,C6_MLDESCO,C6_XDELHIS,C6_TPDEDUZ,C6_MOTDED,C6_FORDED,C6_LOJDED,C6_SERDED,C6_NFDED,C6_VLNFD,C6_PCDED,C6_VLDED,C6_ABATINS,C6_CODLAN,C6_XCCUSTO,C6_VPCEXTR,C6_XREFAUT,SC6.D_E_L_E_T_,SC6.R_E_C_N_O_,SC6.R_E_C_D_E_L_,C6_BASVEIC,C6_TNATREC,C6_CNATREC,C6_GRPNATR,C6_DTFIMNT,C6_XESTMIN,C6_PROGRAM,C6_TURNO,C6_ITPC,C6_PVCOMOP,C6_VDMOST,C6_FILPED,C6_PEDCOM,' ' AS C6_VDOBS,C6_RATEIO,C6_ITLPRE,C6_D1SERIE,C6_D1DOC,C6_CODLPRE,C6_D1ITEM,C6_VLIMPOR,C6_FCICOD,C6_XFILA,C6_CODINF,C6_HORENT,C6_ITEMPC,C6_PMSID,C6_PEDVINC,C6_REVPROD,C6_PRODFIN,C6_NUMPCOM,C6_TPESTR,C6_CC,C6_CONTA,C6_ITEMCTA,C6_CLVL,C6_DATCPL,C6_HORCPL,C6_INTROT,C6_CATEG,C6_CTVAR,C6_PENE,C6_GCPLT,C6_GCPIT,C6_ALMTERC,C6_ITEMGAR,C6_ORCGAR,C6_CCUSTO,C6_SOLCOM,C6_CULTRA,C6_TPPROD,C6_SDOCORI,C6_SDOC,C6_SDOCDED,C6_SDOCSD1,C6_CSTPIS,C6_NRSEQCQ,C6_IPITRF,C6_DATAEMB,C6_TPREPAS,C6_OPER,C6_MSEXP,C6_XNUMID,C6_XKIT,C6_MSDL FROM SF1200 SF1 (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SD1200 SD1 (NOLOCK) ON SD1.D1_FILIAL = SF1.F1_FILIAL AND SD1.D1_DOC = SF1.F1_DOC AND SD1.D1_SERIE = SF1.F1_SERIE AND SD1.D1_FORNECE = SF1.F1_FORNECE AND SD1.D1_LOJA = SF1.F1_LOJA AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SFT200 SFT (NOLOCK) ON SFT.FT_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SFT.FT_TIPOMOV = 'E' AND SFT.FT_SERIE = SD1.D1_SERIE AND SFT.FT_NFISCAL = SD1.D1_DOC AND SFT.FT_PRODUTO = SD1.D1_COD AND SFT.FT_CLIEFOR = SD1.D1_FORNECE AND SFT.FT_LOJA = SD1.D1_LOJA AND SFT.FT_ITEM = SD1.D1_ITEM AND SFT.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SB1200 SB1 (NOLOCK) ON SB1.B1_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SB1.B1_COD = SD1.D1_COD AND SB1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SF4200 SF4 (NOLOCK) ON SF4.F4_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SF4.F4_CODIGO = SD1.D1_TES AND SF4.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SD2200 SD2 (NOLOCK) ON SD2.D2_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SD2.D2_DOC  = SD1.D1_NFORI AND SD2.D2_SERIE = SD1.D1_SERIORI AND SD2.D2_ITEM = SD1.D1_ITEMORI LEFT OUTER JOIN SF2200 SF2 (NOLOCK) ON SF2.F2_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SF2.F2_DOC = SD2.D2_DOC AND SF2.F2_SERIE = SD2.D2_SERIE AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SC6200 SC6 (NOLOCK) ON SC6.C6_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SC6.C6_NUM = SD2.D2_PEDIDO AND SC6.C6_ITEM = SD2.D2_ITEMPV AND SD2.D2_COD = SC6.C6_PRODUTO AND SC6.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SC5200 SC5 (NOLOCK) ON SC5.C5_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SC5.C5_NUM = SD2.D2_PEDIDO AND SC5.C5_CLIENTE = SD2.D2_CLIENTE AND SC5.C5_LOJACLI = SD2.D2_LOJA AND SC5.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' WHERE 1=1 AND SF1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND F1_DTDIGIT BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'

SELECT SC5200.* FROM SD2200 (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SC5200 (NOLOCK) ON SD2200.D2_FILIAL = SC5200.C5_FILIAL AND SD2200.D2_PEDIDO = SC5200.C5_NUM WHERE 1=1 AND SD2200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SC5200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND D2_EMISSAO BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206' UNION ALL SELECT SC5.* FROM SF1200 SF1 (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SD1200 SD1 (NOLOCK) ON SD1.D1_FILIAL = SF1.F1_FILIAL AND SD1.D1_DOC = SF1.F1_DOC AND SD1.D1_SERIE = SF1.F1_SERIE AND SD1.D1_FORNECE = SF1.F1_FORNECE AND SD1.D1_LOJA = SF1.F1_LOJA AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SFT200 SFT (NOLOCK) ON SFT.FT_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SFT.FT_TIPOMOV = 'E' AND SFT.FT_SERIE = SD1.D1_SERIE AND SFT.FT_NFISCAL = SD1.D1_DOC AND SFT.FT_PRODUTO = SD1.D1_COD AND SFT.FT_CLIEFOR = SD1.D1_FORNECE AND SFT.FT_LOJA = SD1.D1_LOJA AND SFT.FT_ITEM = SD1.D1_ITEM AND SFT.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SB1200 SB1 (NOLOCK) ON SB1.B1_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SB1.B1_COD = SD1.D1_COD AND SB1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SF4200 SF4 (NOLOCK) ON SF4.F4_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SF4.F4_CODIGO = SD1.D1_TES AND SF4.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SD2200 SD2 (NOLOCK) ON SD2.D2_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SD2.D2_DOC  = SD1.D1_NFORI AND SD2.D2_SERIE = SD1.D1_SERIORI AND SD2.D2_ITEM = SD1.D1_ITEMORI LEFT OUTER JOIN SF2200 SF2 (NOLOCK) ON SF2.F2_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SF2.F2_DOC = SD2.D2_DOC AND SF2.F2_SERIE = SD2.D2_SERIE AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SC6200 SC6 (NOLOCK) ON SC6.C6_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SC6.C6_NUM = SD2.D2_PEDIDO AND SC6.C6_ITEM = SD2.D2_ITEMPV AND SC6.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SC5200 SC5 (NOLOCK) ON SC5.C5_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SC5.C5_NUM = SD2.D2_PEDIDO AND SC5.C5_CLIENTE = SD2.D2_CLIENTE AND SC5.C5_LOJACLI = SD2.D2_LOJA AND SC5.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' WHERE 1=1 AND SF1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND F1_DTDIGIT BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'

' AS F1_X_OBSNF,F1_VALIRF,F1_NUMMOV,F1_FILORIG,F1_NODIA,F1_DIACTB,F1_TRANSP,F1_PLIQUI,F1_PBRUTO,F1_ESPECI1,F1_VOLUME1,F1_ESPECI2,F1_VOLUME2,F1_ESPECI3,F1_VOLUME3,F1_ESPECI4,F1_VOLUME4,F1_XNROPRO,F1_XPEDCOM,F1_XDELHIS,F1_TPFRETE,F1_VALFAB,F1_VALFAC,F1_VALFET,F1_PLACA,F1_XRECBTO,D_E_L_E_T_,R_E_C_N_O_,R_E_C_D_E_L_,F1_VALINA,F1_BASEINA,F1_BASPIS,F1_BASCOFI,F1_BASCSLL,F1_RECOPI,F1_TPCTE,F1_BASEFUN,F1_EVENFLG,F1_IDCCE,F1_FLAGRGS,F1_IDRGS,F1_CODRGS,F1_DAUTNFE,F1_HAUTNFE,F1_VALPEDG,F1_FORRET,F1_LOJARET,F1_FORENT,F1_LOJAENT,F1_VLSENAR,F1_NUMAIDF,F1_ANOAIDF,F1_XCAMPAN,F1_MENNOTA,F1_MENPAD,F1_MSIDENT,F1_NUMTRIB,F1_CLIORI,F1_LOJAORI,F1_XSTAWMS,F1_IDRECOP,F1_INCISS,F1_ESTPRES,F1_VLCIDE,F1_BASECID,F1_IDSA1,F1_IDSA2,F1_IDSED,F1_VLCPM,F1_BASECPM,F1_VALFMP,F1_BASEFMP,F1_VALFMD,F1_DTCPISS,F1_CLIDEST,F1_LOJDEST,F1_ESTDES,F1_XREC01,F1_XREC02,F1_XHRIALC,F1_XDTIALC,F1_HCOUNT,F1_AGENDA,F1_VALFUND,F1_VALIMA,F1_VALFASE,F1_XUSUINC,F1_DOCISEN,F1_VERBAIS,F1_ORIGEM,F1_MOTIVO,F1_MOTRET,F1_SIMPNAC,F1_TPCOMPL,F1_BOMDES,F1_DEVMERC,F1_MODAL,F1_VEICUL1,F1_HISTRET,F1_CODROM,F1_VEICUL2,F1_VEICUL3,F1_SDOC,F1_SDOCORI,F1_SDOCMAN,F1_SERMDF,F1_NUMMDF,F1_BFCPANT,F1_VFCPANT,F1_BSFCPST,F1_BSFCCMP,F1_BASFECP,F1_UFORITR,F1_MUORITR,F1_UFDESTR,F1_MUDESTR,F1_IVTENV,F1_IDNF,F1_MSEXP,F1_SUBSERI,F1_CODA1U,F1_INDPRES,F1_MSDL FROM SF1200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND F1_DTDIGIT BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'

SELECT SC9200.* FROM SD2200 (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SC9200 (NOLOCK) ON SD2200.D2_FILIAL = SC9200.C9_FILIAL AND SD2200.D2_COD = SC9200.C9_PRODUTO AND SD2200.D2_ITEM = SC9200.C9_ITEM  AND SD2200.D2_PEDIDO = SC9200.C9_PEDIDO WHERE 1=1 AND SD2200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SC9200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND D2_EMISSAO BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206' UNION ALL SELECT SC9.* FROM SF1200 SF1 (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SD1200 SD1 (NOLOCK) ON SD1.D1_FILIAL = SF1.F1_FILIAL AND SD1.D1_DOC = SF1.F1_DOC AND SD1.D1_SERIE = SF1.F1_SERIE AND SD1.D1_FORNECE = SF1.F1_FORNECE AND SD1.D1_LOJA = SF1.F1_LOJA AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SFT200 SFT (NOLOCK) ON SFT.FT_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SFT.FT_TIPOMOV = 'E' AND SFT.FT_SERIE = SD1.D1_SERIE AND SFT.FT_NFISCAL = SD1.D1_DOC AND SFT.FT_PRODUTO = SD1.D1_COD AND SFT.FT_CLIEFOR = SD1.D1_FORNECE AND SFT.FT_LOJA = SD1.D1_LOJA AND SFT.FT_ITEM = SD1.D1_ITEM AND SFT.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SB1200 SB1 (NOLOCK) ON SB1.B1_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SB1.B1_COD = SD1.D1_COD AND SB1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SF4200 SF4 (NOLOCK) ON SF4.F4_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SF4.F4_CODIGO = SD1.D1_TES AND SF4.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SD2200 SD2 (NOLOCK) ON SD2.D2_FILIAL = SD1.D1_FILIAL AND SD2.D2_DOC  = SD1.D1_NFORI AND SD2.D2_SERIE = SD1.D1_SERIORI AND SD2.D2_ITEM = SD1.D1_ITEMORI LEFT OUTER JOIN SF2200 SF2 (NOLOCK) ON SF2.F2_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SF2.F2_DOC = SD2.D2_DOC AND SF2.F2_SERIE = SD2.D2_SERIE AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SC6200 SC6 (NOLOCK) ON SC6.C6_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SC6.C6_NUM = SD2.D2_PEDIDO AND SC6.C6_ITEM = SD2.D2_ITEMPV AND SD2.D2_COD = SC6.C6_PRODUTO AND SC6.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SC5200 SC5 (NOLOCK) ON SC5.C5_FILIAL = SD2.D2_FILIAL AND SC5.C5_NUM = SD2.D2_PEDIDO AND SC5.C5_CLIENTE = SD2.D2_CLIENTE AND SC5.C5_LOJACLI = SD2.D2_LOJA AND SC5.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' INNER JOIN SC9200 SC9 (NOLOCK) ON SC9.C9_FILIAL = SC6.C6_FILIAL AND SC9.C9_PEDIDO = SC6.C6_NUM AND SC9.C9_ITEM = SC6.C6_ITEM AND SC9.C9_PRODUTO = SC6.C6_PRODUTO AND SC9.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' WHERE 1=1 AND SF1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SF2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD1.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND SD2.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND F1_DTDIGIT BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'
SELECT * FROM PAG200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND PAG200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND PAG_DATA BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'

SELECT * FROM PBE200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND PBE200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND PBE_EMICON BETWEEN '20000101' AND '20220206'
SELECT * FROM SB9200 (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND SB9200.D_E_L_E_T_ = '' AND B9_DATA BETWEEN '20220131' AND '20220206'
